## getAllWithFunction() function

Find all entries in the given array for which the function `f` returns true

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getAllWithFunction<T>(a: ArrayLike<T>, f: (_a: T) => boolean): Array<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | ArrayLike&lt;T&gt; | Array to search |
|  f | (\_a: T) =&gt; boolean | Predicate to use to test each entry |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;T&gt;

The entries for which the predicate returned true, empty array if not found.
